overview: The We Play Crazy crew is back again traveling the world to capture the sickest, most twisted freaks on the planet! Extreme sports and incredibly sexy We Play Crazy babes will also keep your a** pinned to the seat in this adrenaline driven film! So sit down, relax, crack open a cold one, and become mesmerized as you witness nuthead after nuthead putting their lives on the line for your entertainment!
tagline: "They may be dead before they're famous"
title: Hella Crazy 2
